original: de nas gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig brjod la slob ma de nyid la sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: de nas gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig brjod la slob ma de nyid la sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: Then, having expressed the great secret pledge, that disciple should be perfectly worshipped with all the hosts of offerings, such as the goddesses of charm and so forth.

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod de /
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod de /
translated: Then, having perfectly praised with the one hundred and eight names,

original: bla na med pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i chos nye bar bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i chos nye bar bstan par bya ste /
translated: the teaching of the Dharma of the unsurpassed great practice should be given.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis yongs su dag pa'i rnal @156b 'byor chen po byin la ston zla ra ba'i yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis yongs su dag pa'i rnal @156b 'byor chen po byin la ston zla ra ba'i yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung la /
translated: Having given the great yoga of the twelve completely pure meditative stabilizations of all tathƒÅgatas, beginning on the eighth day of the waxing moon of the first autumn month,

original: slob ma rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: the disciples should accomplish it.

original: de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can dang thun mong du byas pas phyag rgya chen por yongs su bsngos la /
analyzed: de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can dang thun mong du byas pas phyag rgya chen por yongs su bsngos la /
translated: Then, having made all those roots of virtue common to all sentient beings, they should be dedicated to the great seal.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs su gsol la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs su gsol la /
translated: All buddhas should be requested to depart.

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
translated: O·πÉ akaro mukha·πÉ sarvadharmƒÅ·πáƒÅm |

analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje srung bas yongs su bsrungs nas /
translated: Then, having made the ma·πá·∏çala of the mother, one should offer it to the ma·πá·∏çala of the father.üîΩThen, having made the ma·πá·∏çala of the mother, one should offer it to the ma·πá·∏çala of the father.üîΩThen, having made the ma·πá·∏çala of the mother, one should offer it to the ma·πá·∏çala of the father.üîΩThen, having made the ma·πá·∏çala of the mother, one should offer it to the ma·πá·∏çala of the father.üîΩThen, having made the ma·πá·∏çala of the mother, one should offer it to the ma·πá·∏çala of the father.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la bsrung pa'i 'khor lo bris nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la bsrung pa'i 'khor lo bris nas /
translated: One should draw a wheel of the TathƒÅgata with twelve spokes, and a protection wheel.

original: rab tu gnas par byas nas /
analyzed: rab tu gnas par byas nas /
translated: Having consecrated them,

original: gser la sogs pas dkris nas tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pas dpung pa g-yas par gdags par bya zhing /
analyzed: gser la sogs pas dkris nas tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pas dpung pa g-yas par gdags par bya zhing /
translated: one should wrap them in gold and so forth, and tie them to the right shoulder with a five-colored thread.

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po la yang mchod ston chen po dang sbyin pa'i tshogs chen pos gang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po la yang mchod ston chen po dang sbyin pa'i tshogs chen pos gang bar bya'o //
translated: One should also fill a great assembly of the community of monks with a great feast and a great collection of gifts.

original: ngan song kun sbyong dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: ngan song kun sbyong dpal dang ldan //
translated: Purifying all lower realms, may they be glorious.

original: sdig sbyong rgyal po rgyud kyi ni //
analyzed: sdig sbyong rgyal po rgyud kyi ni //
translated: From the king of tantras that purifies evil,

original: dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa las //
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa las //
translated: the collection of all samayas,

original: dge ba dri med gang thob des //
analyzed: dge ba dri med gang thob des //
translated: whatever stainless virtue I have obtainedüîΩmay all the multitudes of beings in the world,

original: 'gro ba skye bo'i tshogs kun dang // bdag gis dri ma kun spangs te //
analyzed: 'gro ba skye bo'i tshogs kun dang // bdag gis dri ma kun spangs te //
translated: and I myself, having abandoned all stains,

original: rgyal po kun gyis dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: rgyal po kun gyis dbang bskur ba //
translated: may we be consecrated by all the kings,üîΩand may we become glorious vajra holders.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par shog / yul singga la'i rdo rje slob dpon chen po /
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par shog / yul singga la'i rdo rje slob dpon chen po /
translated: The great vajra master of the land of Si·πÖghala,

original: rdo rje go cha'i slob ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje go cha'i slob ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa /
translated: The disciple of Vajra Armor, the great vajra master Kunga Nyingpo, composed this.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The ritual of the great mandala of the glorious Tantra of the Great Yoga of the Total Purification of All Evil Destinies is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ki re na ka ra barma dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong khyung grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ki re na ka ra barma dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong khyung grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
